thread.title: United Airlines chief hospitalized after heart attack, company operating 'normally'
thread.title_full: United Airlines chief hospitalized after heart attack, company operating 'normally'

author: eTN Global Editor
title: United Airlines chief hospitalized after heart attack, company operating 'normally'
text:
United Airlines chief hospitalized after heart attack, company operating 'normally'   
Oct 16, 2015 eTN   
United Continental Holdings said on Friday that its Chief Executive Oscar Munoz had a heart attack and is currently in a Chicago hospital. 
"Our thoughts and prayers are with his family and we are respecting their privacy," the airline said. The company continues to operate "normally," it said. 
United directors were waiting to hear about the severity of the attack and they would decide whether United would need an interim chief, depending on that information, according to Dow Jones. 
Shares of United Continental were down 2.9%.
